decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Using cheap and efficient creatures like Manifold Mouse and Heartfire Hero, along with powerful burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance provide additional value and control options, while cards like Monstrous Rage and Soul-Scar Mage help to boost the damage output of the creatures. Overall, the deck is designed to apply constant pressure and end the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to control the opponent's resources and disrupt their game plan using various removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, along with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress. The deck also emphasizes card advantage and value generation through cards like Liliana of the Veil and Graveyard Trespasser. The addition of powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Cecil, Dark Knight provides a win condition while maintaining control over the game. The deck's mana base is optimized for consistency with a mix of utility lands like Mutavault and Castle Locthwain, along with Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth for fixing.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures and artifacts to trigger abilities like Trail of Crumbs, Deadly Dispute, and Scavenger's Talent. The deck utilizes cards like Ygra, Eater of All and Cauldron Familiar to control the board while establishing a strong presence with Gilded Goose and Witch's Oven. The deck also features removal spells like Abrupt Decay and Fatal Push to deal with threats efficiently. With a mix of creature sacrifice, card draw, and removal, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and win through attrition.

This Rakdos Aggro deck aims to disrupt the opponent's hand with discard spells like Duress and Thoughtseize while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Bloodtithe Harvester and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger. The deck also has removal spells like Go for the Throat and Fatal Push to deal with threats, as well as powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. By combining disruption, aggression, and strong finishers, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with spells and then bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard to deal damage to the opponent. It also includes a variety of spells and cantrips to help enable the Phoenix's ability to return from the graveyard. The deck aims to be aggressive and put pressure on the opponent while utilizing card draw and spell recursion to maintain its momentum. The inclusion of key cards like Artist's Talent and Treasure Cruise help fuel the deck's strategy of quickly reanimating Arclight Phoenix for a powerful offensive push.

This deck focuses on utilizing Indomitable Creativity to combo off and bring out powerful creatures like Valgavoth, Terror Eater and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. It also includes a variety of counterspells and card draw options like Spell Pierce, Censor, and Narset, Parter of Veils to control the game and find key pieces of the combo. The deck also incorporates Prismari Command and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker for additional flexibility and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to create unexpected and game-winning plays through its creative combos and strong synergies.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, and powerful creatures like Graveyard Trespasser and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The deck also utilizes cards like Castle Locthwain and Gifted Aetherborn to generate card advantage and stay ahead in the game. Additionally, cards like Archenemy's Charm and Invoke Despair provide additional disruption and control options to ensure the opponent's strategies are thwarted.

The focus of this UW Control deck is to dominate the game through card advantage, counter spells, and board control. By utilizing cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, the deck aims to limit the opponent's resources while drawing extra cards with cards like Memory Deluge and March of Otherworldly Light. The deck also includes removal spells like Supreme Verdict and Get Lost to maintain board presence. Overall, the strategy revolves around outlasting the opponent and ultimately winning through attrition.

This deck focuses on using Indomitable Creativity to cheat big threats like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Valgavoth, Terror Eater into play. It also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Unable to Scream to provide alternative win conditions. The deck aims to control the board with counterspells like Censor and Spell Pierce, while also utilizing cards like Narset, Parter of Veils for card advantage. The overall strategy involves using creativity and resourcefulness to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through unexpected plays.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on aggressive play by using low-cost, high-impact creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes powerful cards like Bloodtithe Harvester and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Duress and Thoughtseize. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to clear the way for its creatures to deal damage. Overall, the deck aims to win the game through a combination of fast, efficient creatures and disruptive spells.

The main idea of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using discard spells like Duress and Thoughtseize, removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, and powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil. It also aims to control the board through graveyard shenanigans with cards like Cling to Dust and Graveyard Trespasser. The deck also has a strong creature base with Gifted Aetherborn and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse, along with some equipment like Blade of the Oni to close out the game. The deck aims to grind out the opponent and win through attrition.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the Greasefang Parhelion combo, using cards like Guardian of New Benalia and Parhelion II to create a powerful board presence. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the game until the combo can be executed. Being able to protect key creatures with Sheltered by Ghosts and Seasoned Hallowblade and using various lands to fix mana and provide utility rounds out the strategy of this fast-paced, aggressive combo deck.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan and control the board using removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. The deck also utilizes hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress. Additionally, the deck aims to generate advantage with cards like Liliana of the Veil and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse. The inclusion of cards like Archenemy's Charm and Graveyard Trespasser provide additional versatility and threats to the deck's strategy. Overall, the deck seeks to gain control of the game and outvalue the opponent through resource management and disruption.

This deck focuses on casting multiple cheap spells to quickly fill up the graveyard with Arclight Phoenixes and then bring them back for repeated attacks. It also includes cards to draw through the deck quickly and deal damage directly to the opponent. The key strategy is to efficiently use spells to enable the recursion of Arclight Phoenix while also maintaining card advantage and controlling the board with removal spells. By carefully planning your plays and managing resources effectively, you can overwhelm your opponent with a flurry of powerful spells and creatures.

The main concept of this Aggro Red Deck Wins deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on dealing damage as quickly as possible, using cards like Burst Lightning, Reckless Rage, and Monstrous Rage to clear the way for creatures like Heartfire Hero, Kumano Faces Kakkazan, and Emberheart Challenger to deal damage. The inclusion of cards like Mutavault and Den of the Bugbear provide additional threats and utility. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying creatures and gaining life with cards like Bishop of Wings and Righteous Valkyrie, while also utilizing powerful spells like Collected Company to maintain board presence. The deck aims to be proactive and push damage early on to overwhelm opponents, while also having the ability to generate additional value through cards like Skyclave Apparition and Resplendent Angel. With a mix of efficient creatures and impactful spells, this deck aims to pressure opponents and close out games swiftly.
